de.awi.floenavigation.synchronization

Class ConfigurationParameterSync

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.awi.floenavigation.synchronization.ConfigurationParameterSync

  • public class ConfigurationParameterSync
extends java.lang.Object
    Synchronizes configuration paramters (internal parameters) in the Local Database with the Server. Reads all the parameters of DatabaseHelper.configParametersTable from the Database and stores it in HashMaps. Creates StringRequests and inserts it into a RequestQueue to push and pull Data from the Server. Clears the DatabaseHelper.configParametersTable table before inserting Data that was pulled from the Server.

    Uses ConfigurationParameter to create a new Object and insert it into local Database, for configurations parameters that is pulled from the Server.

    See Also:
    DatabaseHelper.configParametersTable, SyncActivity, ConfigurationParameter, de.awi.floenavigation.synchronization

    • Method Detail

      • onClickParameterReadButton

        public void onClickParameterReadButton()
        Reads the Table and inserts the data from all the Columns of the Table in to their respective HashMap.
        Throws:
        android.database.sqlite.SQLiteException - In case of error in reading database

      • onClickParameterSyncButton

        public void onClickParameterSyncButton()
        Creates StringRequests as per the size of configParameterName data extracted from the local database and inserts all the requests in the RequestQueue A Stringrequest request for pushing the data is registered and added to the requestQueue. callback function Response.Listener#onResponse(Object) notifies whether the request was successful or not If it is unsuccessful or the connection is not established Response.Listener#error(VolleyError) gets called

      • onClickParameterPullButton

        public void onClickParameterPullButton(long baseStations)
        Function is used to pull data from internal database to the server A Stringrequest request for pulling the data is registered and added to the requestQueue. callback function Response.Listener#onResponse(Object) notifies whether the request was successful or not If it is unsuccessful or the connection is not established Response.Listener#error(VolleyError) gets called On pulling the data from the server internal database tables DatabaseHelper.configParametersTable are cleared.

        The server sends the data in .xml format, therefore it has to extract the data based on the tags Inside Response.Listener#onResponse(Object) it loops through the entire xml file till it reaches the end of document. Based on the XmlPullParser.START_TAG, XmlPullParser.TEXT, XmlPullParser.END_TAG it adds the values received to the corresponding ConfigurationParameter.setParameterName(String), ConfigurationParameter.setParameterValue(String) Each configurationParameter is added to the configParamArrayList which is individually taken and added to the internal database.

      • setBaseUrl

        public void setBaseUrl(java.lang.String baseUrl,
                       java.lang.String port)
        Used to initialize pushURL and pullURL
        Parameters:
        baseUrl - Url set by the administrator, which is stored in the local database
        port - port number set by the administrator, which is stored in the local database (default value is 80)

      • getDataCompleted

        public boolean getDataCompleted()
